Articles.Content: Does anyone know if saves from 0.16 will be persistent into 0.17? I'm not so much concerned about ships in orbit, but my ships that have landed on the Mun and Minimus. Thanks
It's pretty standard that any new version will break the .craft and persistence files, it is Alpha after all, the Dev's shouldn't have to waste time trying to make everything backwards compatible.
I have to say the images from the interplanetary missions are just spectacular. KSP continues to amaze me. I love that new galactic background, too.

Cough

Section 3: Spam

A user shall not: Create a Post containing no real content, such as '+1!' or other single word responses.

A user shall not: Post reaction images alone.

Just in case this one becomes necessary......

Section 3 Addendum: Reaction Images

Posting Reaction Images that cause a thread to derail, shall net the user that posted the image, an immediate revoke in posting rights. The length of the Revoke status shall be determined at the time of the infraction. This is not a permanent revoke.

/cough

Are you saying this to Nova? i would hope him being a dev of the game gives him the ability to bend the rules a bit. If not, shouldn't a pm to him be more professional then posting it to public? A mods gotta mod but it is a bit surprising seeing a mod threaten a dev.

Are you saying this to Nova? i would hope him being a dev of the game gives him the ability to bend the rules a bit. If not, shouldn't a pm to him be more professional then posting it to public? A mods gotta mod but it is a bit surprising seeing a mod threaten a dev.

It was directed at the image Vostok posted. So I've been wondering about Nova's photo and I can't figure out what is under the crew tank(what I assume is a crew tank, anyway). Is it just a 2m to 1m adapter from one of the other mods or might it be something else, which I think it is.. Also, it is super nice to see shadows working correctly again.

Daaam, this thing looks ugly and unstable..

Edited August 20, 2012 by Atimed

Does anyone know if saves from 0.16 will be persistent into 0.17? I'm not so much concerned about ships in orbit, but my ships that have landed on the Mun and Minimus. Thanks

I doubt that saves will carry forward to 0.17, as the parts will get altered, which would mess up any rockets, also a main feature is adding new SOI's to the game, which would interfere with any ships in the location they are added to. Any changes to Kerbin and its moons could also put ships in now impossible locations.
Nova's crazy creation looks like a Minmatar ship from EVE Online...

Nova's crazy creation looks like a Minmatar ship from EVE Online...

Needs more rust.

Yay! If 0.17 come out ill buy this game,just played only the demo now.

Lot of planets,eva,iva,and finally stars on the sky!
is that a unmand pod ore space station part just under the command pod?.

I can't figure out what is under the crew tank(what I assume is a crew tank, anyway)

I'm guessing the crew tank was supposed to hide in plain sight using the crazy craft as camo... maybe you can IVA inside? Either that or nova successfully derailed a pointless physics conversation with a ship that does not make sense.
We want more pocs of eventually new parts!

We want more pocs of eventually new parts!

I'm not sure there's been any pics of confirmed new parts. Most of what I've seen that people were asking if it was new or not, was someone's mod. Of course, there's been no word on what appears to be a passenger module on that ship Nova posted.
It might be that his rocket has no new stock parts and is just using mods. He has confirmed many times that he is using mods while testing .17.
Why, then, would he post a picture of it here? It doesn't seem to be exhibiting any OTHER new features of .17...
Well, if it is a picture of him testing .17 then it applies to the thread. Maybe he just liked the rocket and wanted to post a picture of it while confusing everyone and their dog.
Looks to me like there's a launch escape system, and an extended range habitat in there.

Yay! If 0.17 come out ill buy this game,...

What do you mean, "If [it] come out"?
... and why not buy it now anyway? .17 will be out soon enough, and you'll be able to learn from all the improvements between the beta and .16 before getting to .17 craft.
With all the weird fuel line usage. What are the chances this is an orbital refueling platform. Otherwise its a very odd space station...
Sorry for the bad english. :/
That picture of that strange spacecraft could have just been put here to confuse us all and get us all in a hype. Which was quite effective, whether or not that was it's intention.
Maybe he just wanted to post a picture of a space craft with the new space background texture?
My question is what is that central part of the ship (below the command module), I have never seen before.
